title: Dataset Citations List
description: Schema for the list of the number of citations for a given dataset

source.description: The source of the citation count (e.g., Crossref, Google Scholar, etc.).

count.description: The number of citations reported by this source.

updated.description: The timestamp when the citation information was last updated from this source (ISO 8601 format).

comment.description: Optional comments or additional information about the citation source.
